name: Carl Paolino
bio: Hi! I'm a passionate computer science student at Georgia Tech with experience in full-stack development, planning to graduate in Spring 2027. I am currently taking doing research in drone communication and exploring machine learning/ai projects in my free time.
lookingFor: Internship opportunities in Spring or Summer 2026
Part-time contracting work in Full Stack Development or ml/ai projects
Chats, advice, or connections from experienced engineers
